Projected Monthly STEP Buybacks from Validator Revenue

Step Validator's 675k delegated SOL generates significant revenue for STEP token buybacks each month. We've gathered some projections for monthly STEP buybacks if SOL price continues this upward

STEP DATA INSIGHTS #014

'The Launchpad Wars'

Pump fun's dominance begins to shrink with several new platforms entering into the 'Launchpad Wars'. In its first few weeks of launch, LetsBonk has quickly gathered marketshare and is now responsible for over 18% of token launches

In the past 4 days, Step fee wallet has acquired 1,555,984 STEP for $136,222 USD at an average cost of 0.0875 per token. 

The fee wallet currently now holds 23.54M STEP (6.73% total supply) purchased through token buybacks.

Lesson: use Step Dashboard for all wallet cleanup

Big mistake, big lesson, and that’s why I still call myself a newbie.

Sometimes it’s distraction, sometimes it’s fatigue.
But what matters is learning fast and owning the L.

@Backpack

Step has a privacy preserving accounts feature which we havent seen anywhere else

STEP DATA INSIGHTS #013

Step Fee Wallet's Insatiable Hunger for STEP

Using revenue from Step's products and brands under Step, the fee wallet typically buys on average 2.3% of total STEP supply each month through token buybacks.

In 2024, 100M tokens previously purchased
